channel.title: Can not connect to server
channel.description:
Hello. I've played Moparscape before. I remember getting it to work, I just don't know what I did to get it there. Here's what I have done so far: •Port Forwarded 0-43594 •DL'd and set up MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan •Tried to log in with a random name and pass e.g. User: ManlyBabe Pass: ******* IP: joepkz.no-ip.info Port: 43594
I've tried anything and searched everything, but cannot seem to find out what I'm doing wrong. I'm using a private server address, no special clients other than MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan.
Please help me. I want to start playing Mopar again!!! :( :( :( :(
- MoparapoM

item.title: Can not connect to server
item.dc:creator: @moparapom moparapom
item.description:
@moparapom wrote:

Hello.
I’ve played Moparscape before. I remember getting it to work, I just don’t know what I did to get it there. Here’s what I have done so far:
•Port Forwarded 0-43594
•DL’d and set up MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
•Tried to log in with a random name and pass
e.g. User: ManlyBabe Pass: ******* IP: joepkz.no-ip.info Port: 43594

I’ve tried anything and searched everything, but cannot seem to find out what I’m doing wrong. I’m using a private server address, no special clients other than MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan.

Please help me. I want to start playing Mopar again!!!

  • MoparapoM

Read full topic
